definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

sentences.english: Gives with it does myo- relieves thirst, is one kind of arrogant and willful simply.
sentences.chinese: 用它給乾性肌解渴，簡直是一種驕縱。

sentences.english: Everything is too arrogant, I thought you would understand.
sentences.chinese: 一切是我太過驕縱，以爲你會懂。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the mind of local young people is so empty and lifeless as if they were over-exploited.
sentences.chinese: 現今，當地年輕人的思想空泛，似乎是被驕縱的一代。

pampered son of a wealthy family
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
